title: 【2018年 研發替代役-台北】軟體工程師 Software Engineer / Programmer
company: 新加坡商鈦坦科技股份有限公司
content: 你所追求的工作是什麼？是寫【程式】，還是打造會讓你感到驕傲的【產品】? 寫【程式】的工作，只是單純的把功能完成。 完成【程式】之外，並且考慮到效能、安全、使用性、維護成本、以及花費的資源與時間等因素所造成的影響。在分析及評估所有影響要素後，達到客戶滿意的產出，才是我們對開發【產品】的要求！ 你一定聽過敏捷式開發，但是你真正了解什麼是敏捷式開發嗎？ 是很快速的把程式寫完？還是只是一堆似懂非懂的名詞？ 如果你/妳自認具備【熱忱】、【追求極致】、【樂於團隊合作】的特質， 我們歡迎你/妳一起加入鈦坦科技的開發團隊 在這個大家庭裡，你將會在專業敏捷開發顧問的協助下 學習到敏捷式開發的精髓，並且實際運用敏捷開發的框架，與團隊一起打造極致的產品。 我們堅信：沒有最好，只有更好！•	依據客戶的需求及主管的要求，開發並維護高效能、高安全性、使用者易用的網站應用程式。•	整合網站應用程式至資料庫導向或API導向的後台系統。•	提供24x7的技術支援。•	開發、改善所有軟體產品，並提供維護所需的所有必要文件。•	Familiar in server side languages (C# .Net).•	Familiar in ECMA Script, AJAX.•	Familiar in Object Oriented Language.•	Familiar in SQL-92 databases (Microsoft SQL server).•	Microsoft SQL Server 2008•       年假12天(試用期後即可使用)，服務第3年即可享有14日，第4年開始每1年增加1日，最多為30日。
other_condition: TOEIC需500分以上或英檢中級

title: C&B Manager
company: 大陸工程股份有限公司
content: About CEC CEC is a publicly listed construction player with an aggressive footprint in the Asia region. Job Description We are looking for an HR Senior Manager to head the Compensations & Benefits team to drive change across our business territories. Reporting directly to the Head of HR, the C&B Senior Manager will be tasked with the strategic alignment of C&B policies across the group throughout the Asia region (including HK, Macao, Malaysia, and India). With the growth of the business, and plans for further expansion in the pipeline, the C&B Senior Manager will lead a team of 3 C&B Supervisors and Specialists to continually enhance, strengthen and harmonize C&B policy across the region. The position will require occasional travel to meet up with senior stakeholders (primarily HK). The role also entails a high-value project to align the corporate grading, compensation structure, and corresponding benefits for the region.
other_condition: The Successful Applicant The ideal candidate will: -Hold a Master’s Degree (or higher) in Human Resource management (or equivalent) -Possess a minimum of 10 years HR C&B experience in consulting firms, in-house, or a mixture of both. -Be experienced in C&B strategy and alignment on a regional level -Possess strong leadership and coaching ability for team development -Present forward-thinking initiatives to work out the best practices applicable to the organization as a whole on a granular and regional level Our Offer CEC offers an attractive remuneration package and the opportunity to work directly with senior management in the formulation and implementation of company HR strategy. This role is ideal for C&B candidates seeking to drive change across the region and strike up enhanced initiatives to propel the business forward. Apply For This Job Send updated resume (MS Word format) to Vhwang@continental-engineering.com; or call +886-2-37016730 or +886-939868708 for all inquiries. All received job applications will be treated confidentially and will not be shared or distributed.
